name: Last Signal (CKiTT)
description:
You will play as a  scavenger trapped in the middle of an asteroid field with just a basic mining tool. To battle the intense thermal wave coming from the system's star you must leave the ship and mine the asteroid, use the resources to UPGRADES your ship and mining tool.

CONTROLS ButtonActionWASDMovementMOUSELookLEFT MOUSEFireEInteract
